subject: Basketball
Sports Injuries
lead_paragraph: J. R. Smith, who had surgery days after signing a three-year, $17.95 million contract, remains unsure whether he will be ready for the Knicks’ season opener.
snippet: J. R. Smith, who had surgery days after signing a three-year, $17.95 million contract, remains unsure whether he will be ready for the Knicks’ season opener.
